name: W1LS0N
description:
W1LS0N is a game about being stranded on and island and calling for help.

Use any means necessary to type and dial in the right(?) inputs!

[SPOILER: once you 'pick up' the 'button' just click again on the call button to progress]

made by-

Jonty Guite(Game Design, Sound and Coding) & Sahana Murthy(Game Design, Narrative, Theme and Art Direction)

[This was developed for TriJam#97 with the Unorthodox Solutions or Illegal Actions theme. We tried to incorporate a bit of the hacker diversifier as well. You might find the files mention the MixandJam jam.. that's a typo that went too deep into development to change. Apologies.]
